name: The Masquerade at Alltale Manor
description:
The Masquerade at Alltale Manor is a crossover episode featuring my characters from various TTRPGs and the like. 

Features Include:

  • 8 Characters! With lore!
  • Over 6500 words!
  • Multiple endings!
  • Consumption of inconsequential amounts of cocktails!
  • Mystery, secrets and maybe romance?
  • The option to simply not engage with any of it!
